The Russian plane crash in Egypt may have been the result of a terrorist attack, so all flights to Egypt have been suspended since Friday
25,000 Russians left Egypt on special flights over the weekend. Their luggage, which carries a higher risk, was transported separately
Issues related to safety cannot be rushed. A special commission is addressing the situation around Egypt https://t.co/o6azwm21x9
RT @BrunoRetailleau: Thank you all for being so numerous tonight at #Andard with @NicolasSarkozy and @jclagarde! # PDL2015 # Regional2015
The fall of the Berlin Wall reminds us of three great challenges facing Europe. #Mauerfall #EuropaRede
One: The West's liberal democracy is questioned & undermined. Our common task is to rebuild transatlantic trust & cooperation. #BC2015
Two: To protect the area of European freedom, external borders are necessary. No external borders means no Europe without internal borders.
Three: #RefugeeCrisis breeds fears. Biggest opportunity for radical populists since 1945. Our greatest task is to protect liberal democracy.
European future will largely depend on Germany's approach to #RefugeeCrisis. Germany & Angela Merkel examples of best European tradition.
Europe should show solidarity to Germany. And Germany must believe that it is co-responsible for whole political community of Europeans.

"It's always good to be with OFA. It's a little bit like coming home."—President Obama #OFAFallSummit
"Together, we created a movement for change that couldn't be denied."—President Obama #OFAFallSummit
"You be the change you want to come about."—President Obama #OFAFallSummit
"You figure out what's important in your communities and you organize around it."—President Obama at the #OFAFallSummit
"We've seen the longest streak of private-sector job creation on record—that happened because of you." —President Obama #OFAFallSummit
"We've covered 17.6 million Americans so far, and in the process the deficit's been cut by two-thirds." —President Obama #OFAFallSummit
"Even as our economy is growing, America's cut our carbon pollution more than any other advanced nation on Earth." —President Obama
"You know we've got more work to do. You wouldn't be here if you didn't think we have more work to do."—President Obama #OFAFallSummit
"Your organizing skills are more important than ever."—President Obama #OFAFallSummit
"We've still got our work cut out for us to fix the broken immigration system." —President Obama #OFAFallSummit
"When the cynics tell us we can't change this country for the better, we know they're wrong. We've got proof." —President Obama
"I may only hold this office for the next 14 months, but I'm not going anywhere." —President Obama #OFAFallSummit
"I need you to stay involved. I need you to stay active." —President Obama #OFAFallSummit
"I'm going to keep on going as long as you'll have me." —President Obama to @OFA volunteers #OFAFallSummit
